meanings.definition: The act of forming into ribbons.
meanings.sent1: Her ribboning of the gift added a special touch.
meanings.sent2: The ribboning on the present made it look beautiful.
meanings.sent3: She was so good at ribboning that she could turn anything into a gift.
meanings.sent4: The ribboning of the fabric transformed it into a delicate masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The ribboning process was intricate and required attention to detail.

meanings.definition: The process of decorating or adorning with ribbons.
meanings.sent1: The ribboning of the room for the party was a fun task.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed ribboning the Christmas tree with colorful ribbons.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to be ribboning itself with the curtains, creating a funny sight.
meanings.sent4: Her ribboning of the cake with frosting resembled a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The ribboning of the dress with lace added an elegant touch to the outfit.
